name: Charne
description:
Welcome to Charne; a dog running simulator game that consists of three levels, every level difficulty getting harder and harder. 

How to play:

Moving: Arrow keys to move left & right and space button to jump. 

Losing & Winning: Follow the path and dodge obstacles. When you hit an obstacle there will be a restart button. Click on it and you can restart the level.  Make it all the way through the level and you'll see a "Next Level" button.  When you have made it though all three levels you'll see a "Main Menu" button. You can go back to the title screen and play again. 

Good Luck.
